note: GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.
title: Antibiotic use in livestock vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Antibiotic use in livestock, measured as the milligrams of total active ingredient used per kilogram of meat production versus gross domestic product (GDP) per capita.
sourceDesc: European Medicines Agency, European Surveillance of Veterinary Antimicrobial Consumption (2017), and Van Boeckel et al. (2015); Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
